content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols for help using japanese charted patterns please visit the japanese knitting & crochet group 1 **japanese version available here 2 ** **tools/materials ** * japanese size lace #2 crochet hook 1 5mm * 7 curtain clips 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/japanese-knitting-and-crochet 2 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/1222cc/
